item.title:
Scarlett Johansson reveals that she was turned down for Alfonso Cuarón’s ‘GRAVITY’
“I had wanted that role so much. It was sort of the straw that broke the camel’s back. I felt really frustrated and hopeless. Like, ‘Am I doing the right job?’”
http://bit.ly/42xTLY8
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
The story is told from “a fictional point of view.”
Showrunner Akiva Goldsman says “it was about really creating empathy — to create a character that you’d really ally with and feel connected to and so his journey would become the audience's journey.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Tom Holland says he hopes ‘THE CROWDED ROOM’ will make viewers “have more respect and sympathy for people who are going through mental health issues.”
“I hope that people will feel educated about the powers of mental health, the struggles, our incredible abilities to survive.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Emmy Rossum and Amanda Seyfried star in Apple TV+ psychological thriller series ‘THE CROWDED ROOM’.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Tom Holland says working on ‘THE CROWDED ROOM’ changed how he views his own mental health.
“Learning about mental health and the power of it has been something that has been so informative to my own life.”
He also is one year and four months sober.
(https://ew.com/tv/tom-holland-the-crowded-room-interview-photos-akiva-goldsman/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Apple TV+ psychological thriller series ‘THE CROWDED ROOM’ premieres June 9th.
item.author: FilmUpdates
